description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Login' that renders a login page with OAuth options (Google, GitHub, Facebook) and a manual email/password form. It manages user login state, redirects upon successful login, and utilizes context and routing hooks.

methods.name: Login()
methods.description: React component function that renders the login interface and handles authentication logic.

methods.name: handleLogin
methods.description: Function to trigger login with specified provider and navigate to profile page.
